name: Treasure Hunter
tagline: Get to the treasure at the end of the maze!
body:
Treasure Hunter provides procedurally generated levels, teleportation and lovely but evil bugs. Attempt to reach the treasure at the end of the maze!

[Gameplay Footage](https://youtu.be/kY3qjPCKzsY)

### Tools
- C#
- XNA 4.0
- HLSL

### Controls
- Up/Down/Left/Right: to move
- Spacebar: near the edge of the walkway to teleport across a gap
- Escape: to exit
 
### Features
- Procedural Level Generation
- Lighting
- Collision Detection
- Radar
- Enemy Bugs
- Score System
- Time Limit
- Screens
  - Intro
  - Game 
  - Score 
  - Game Over 
- Teleportation
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
